name: underpart
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C ] the underneath or bottom part of something: I've had the underpart of my hair dyed black. The boy could not stand upright, but dragged the underpart of his body behind him in the dust. underparts
[ plural ] the underneath part of the body of a bird or animal: They are brown birds with white underparts.
See more
More examplesFewer examplesI accidentally scraped the underpart of the car.The under part to Tom's house is where his cousin lives.The under part of the stomach is white, dotted with brown.The young birds can easily be distinguished by their white underparts.The wild rabbit is grey-brown with pale underparts and upright, not droopy, ears.
